methods.name: public Builder setRefreshBroadcastId(@Nullable String refreshBroadcastId)
methods.comment:
* Sets an optional broadcast id provided by Safety Center when requesting a refresh, * through {@link SafetyCenterManager#EXTRA_REFRESH_SAFETY_SOURCES_BROADCAST_ID}. * *

This will only be relevant for events of type {@link * #SAFETY_EVENT_TYPE_REFRESH_REQUESTED}. * * @see #getType()

methods.name: public Builder setSafetySourceIssueId(@Nullable String safetySourceIssueId)
methods.comment:
* Sets the id of the {@link SafetySourceIssue} this event is associated with (if any). * *

This will only be relevant for events of type {@link * #SAFETY_EVENT_TYPE_RESOLVING_ACTION_SUCCEEDED} or {@link * #SAFETY_EVENT_TYPE_RESOLVING_ACTION_FAILED}. * * @see #getType() * @see SafetySourceIssue#getId()

methods.name: public Builder setSafetySourceIssueActionId(@Nullable String safetySourceIssueActionId)
methods.comment:
* Sets the id of the {@link SafetySourceIssue.Action} this event is associated with (if * any). * *

This will only be relevant for events of type {@link * #SAFETY_EVENT_TYPE_RESOLVING_ACTION_SUCCEEDED} or {@link * #SAFETY_EVENT_TYPE_RESOLVING_ACTION_FAILED}. * * @see #getType() * @see SafetySourceIssue.Action#getId()

methods.name: public SafetyEvent build()
methods.comment: Creates the {@link SafetyEvent} represented by this {@link Builder}.
